name: Xerophobia
description:
Experience a new kind of immersive horror in Xerophobia! 

You are trapped in a valley deep in the desert with a Scolomorph, an intelligent insectoid hunter. 

Explore the surrounding villages, evade the hunter, and find a way to escape. 

Your only weapons will be stealth, your sense of hearing, and a faint light. 

Xerophobia is an intense and scary experience, not for the faint of heart. 

You have been warned!

FEATURES (0.3.9):
  • Backpack-based Inventory system
  • 3D Audio for the player, enemies, NPCs, and points of interest to guide the player
  • Hand physics
  • Physics and collisions for dozens of prop types
  • New hand models
  • Cel-shaded/low res art style
  • 60 FPS on Oculus Quest 2
  • Procedural spawning of wildlife (deers and rabbits)
  • Fully animated and sound-enabled wildlife
  • Fully animated and sound-enabled scolomorph
  • Villages, military base, cottage points of interest
  • Battery and generator-based victory condition
EARLY ACCESS INFORMATION:

As a solo indie developer, your early access purchase will help me continue to be able to update this game.

I hope to make one of the best VR Horror games on the market and hopefully you will join me on this journey.
